titles.title: Haitian Educational Empowerment Act of 2010
To establish a scholarship program in the Department of State for Haitian students whose studies were interrupted as a result of the January 12, 2010, earthquake, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: 9/28/2010--Introduced. Haitian Educational Empowerment Act of 2010 - Directs the Secretary of State, through the Assistant Secretary of State for Educational and Cultural Affairs, to establish a scholarship program for qualifying Haitian undergraduate or graduate students whose studies were interrupted as a result of the January 12, 2010, earthquake.
